StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEASMarineView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int = 0, @Month int = 0, @FY int = 0, @HighSchool uniqueiden..er )
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT n.Organiza.on_of_Record_id as 'OrgId', RTRIM(pg.Rank_Code) as 'Rank', RTRIM(p.Last_Name) as 'LastName', RTRIM(p.First_Name) as 'FirstName', c.Contract_Begin_Date as 'EnlistmentDate', m.Expira.on_Of_Ac.ve_Service as 'EAS', s.Ship_Date as 'ShipDate', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[REFERRAL] r WHERE r.[DEP_CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] OR r.[MARINE_ID] = n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID]) AS EnlistmentCredit, hs.HighSchool_Name as 'HighSchool', n.rowguid as 'NWAId', n.NWA_ID as 'NWAId_int', n.email_address as 'EmailAddress' FROM person p INNER JOIN Marine_Candidate mc ON p.Person_ID = mc.Marine_Candidate_id INNER JOIN nwa n ON mc.Marine_Candidate_ID = n.Marine_Candidate_ID INNER JOIN Contract c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Shipper s ON s.Contract_ID = c.Contract_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Candidate_Status cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(Educa.on_Level) Educa.onLevel, Marine_Candidate_ID FROM Candidate_Educa.on GROUP BY Marine_Candidate_ID ) ce ON ce.Marine_Candidate_ID = mc.Marine_Candidate_ID INNER JOIN candidate_Educa.on ceII ON ceII.Marine_Candidate_ID = ce.Marine_Candidate_ID and ceII.Educa.on_Level = ce.Educa.onLevel INNER JOIN High_School hs ON hs.School_Code = ceII.School_Code INNER JOIN Marine m ON m.Marine_ID = mc.Marine_Candidate_ID INNER JOIN dbo.PAY_GRADE pg ON m.Present_Grade_Code = pg.Pay_Grade_Code WHERE (n.Organiza.on_of_Record_id = @OrgID) AND (cs.Status_Type = 'E' AND cs.Status_Code = 'C' AND cs.Disposi.on_Code = 'P') AND (DatePart(MONTH, GetDate()) < DatePart(MONTH, m.Expira.on_Of_Ac.ve_Service)) AND (DatePart(MONTH, m.Expira.on_Of_Ac.ve_Service) = @Month OR @Month = 0) AND (DatePart(YEAR, m.Expira.on_Of_Ac.ve_Service) = @FY OR @FY = 0) AND (hs.rowguid = @HighSchool) AND ( provenPerformer is null OR provenPerformer = 0) ORDER BY LastName
END
